CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Invoicing_Agreement__c) = "Per Booked Seat", Booked_Seats__c * Price_Per_Cover_Excl_Vat__c, IF( TEXT(Invoicing_Agreement__c) = "Per Scanned Attendee", Count_of_Scanned_Tickets__c * Price_Per_Cover_Excl_Vat__c, IF( TEXT(Invoicing_Agreement__c) = "Venue Rental Cost", Venue_Rental_Cost_Excl_Vat__c, 0 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the expected invoice amount, based on the noted Invoicing Agreement. If Invoicing Agreement is not set, it will write "0".
CustomField.label: Expected Invoice Amount
